page.title: 14 The Library
page.content: Our small survey showed that many people in our block enjoy gardening, greyhound racing,going out for a drink,and going to activities organized by the churches and chapels. Many people enjoy reading. {The Library} The Library in Lanchester is open Mon. and Friday 2.00pm-5.30pm,Tuesday and Thursday,s 2.00pm-7.00pm and Saturday 9.00am-12.00 noon.Borrowers come from Lanchester,Satley,Burnhope,Consett and Langley Park.There are 16,376 books and there are 2,107 active borrowers.The most popular type of book is light fiction or romances,thrillers,westerns,but non-fiction is also popular and accounts for 25.3% of all books borrowed.The most popular books borrowed by children are about horses, computers and T.V. programmes.
